attributes.action: Call for a judicial review of the legality of the referendum on EU membership
attributes.background: Several articles in newspapers and on social media have questioned the legality of the EU membership referendum. As this is a complex issue it needs experienced legal professionals to explore the issue and come to some decision

rejection.details:
Judicial review is a court process. The courts are responsible for it. You can read more about it here:

https://www.judiciary.gov.uk/you-and-the-judiciary/judicial-review/

If you want a judicial inquiry into the referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139567
